description: Calculation of travel time (in sec) between points based on the type of transport

blocks.name: getDrivingDuration
blocks.description: Сalculate the duration of travel by car

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The api key obtained from Mapbox

args.name: coordinates
args.info: Array of objects like [{'lng': value1, 'lat': value2}, {'lng': value3, 'lat': value4}] minimum 2 pairs of coordinates. Maximum 100 pairs.

blocks.name: getDrivingDurationByFile
blocks.description: Сalculate the duration of travel by car (json file coordinates)

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The api key obtained from Mapbox

args.name: coordinates
args.info: File with coordinates in json format. Maximum 100 pairs of coordinates like [[longitude1,latitude1], [longitude2,latitude2]].

args.info: Array of objects like [{'lng': value1, 'lat': value2}, {'lng': value3, 'lat': value4}] minimum 2 pairs of coordinates. Maximum 100 pairs.

blocks.description: Сalculate the duration of travel by walking (json file coordinates)

args.name: coordinates
args.info: File with coordinates in json format. Maximum 100 pairs of coordinates like [[longitude1,latitude1], [longitude2,latitude2]].
